description: The fund invests primarily in domestic and foreign debt securities that the sub-adviser, Wellington Management Company LLP (“Wellington Management”), considers to be attractive from a yield perspective while considering total return and also incorporating a sustainability framework. The fund normally invests in non-investment grade debt securities and highly rated securities. The fund will normally invest at least 80% of its assets in securities of issuers that Wellington Management determines meet its sustainable investing criteria.
name: Hartford Sustainable Income ETF
